assignment1

Class Assignment1

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment1.Assignment1

  • public class Assignment1
extends java.lang.Object

    Driver class

    The purpose of this program is to review some concepts that we learnt previously concerning classes, loops, array of objects, static methods and static attributes. For this assignment, we had to create a Book class which possessed 4 attributes (price, author, ISB, and title). We then implemented this class in the driver class called Assignment1 (which simulated a book store) to keep track of the books. We were able to add new Books to the "store", change information of a book, display all books by a specific author and display all books under a certain price
    COMP249
    Assignment 1
    Due date: Thursday, January 31st, 2018

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This is the main method where the Book class is being used.

      • displayMenu

        public static void displayMenu()
        This methods displays the main menu of this program, providing the user with 5 choices

        1. Enter new books
        2. Change the information of a book.
        3. Display all books by a specific author.
        4. Display all books under a certain price.
        5. End the program

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword()
        This method checks if the user input matches the password. The user has 3 chances to enter the correct input. Once that limit is reached without the correct password, a false value is returned.
        Returns:
        Boolean - true if the user has successfully entered the valid password; false otherwise

      • changeBookInfo

        public static void changeBookInfo(int choice,
                  int index)
        This method is used to change an information from an existing book in the inventory. This method is called when the user decides which information they want to change from the book they chose. Depending on their choice, a message will prompt the user to enter the new value of said property/information of the book.
        Parameters:
        choice - the choice (1-Author, 2-Title, 3-ISBN, 4-Price, 5-Quit Operation) corresponding to the information the user wants to change from an existing book in the inventory.
        index - the index number of the book in the inventory(an array).
